body_html: I'm fine with changing it, such that the "simple" criterion for contiguity passes, as long as we keep CUDA and CPU consistent. There's no reason why we have to limit this to cuDNN bindings if we can get it for free, without breaking compatibility in any way
body_text: I'm fine with changing it, such that the "simple" criterion for contiguity passes, as long as we keep CUDA and CPU consistent. There's no reason why we have to limit this to cuDNN bindings if we can get it for free, without breaking compatibility in any way
body: I'm fine with changing it, such that the "simple" criterion for contiguity passes, as long as we keep CUDA and CPU consistent. There's no reason why we have to limit this to cuDNN bindings if we can get it for free, without breaking compatibility in any way
